website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 860 v7 is a stability shoe designed for road running. It provides a great combination of cushioning, comfort and breathability. Several liked the overall performance of the shoe, but a few were disappointed by its expensive price and limited color options. Made as a stability shoe, the shoe does not disappoint runners who are looking for support.
pros: Reviews mentioned that the shoe provides great stability and support
The no-sew construction reduced the risk of blisters and irritation
The upper felts soft and breathable, based on a review
Based on reviews, the New Balance 860 v7 was a comfortable shoe
The shoe’s cushioning system delivers a soft, responsive ride
Testers mentioned that the added cushioning in the heel provided a comfortable foot lock down
cons: The New Balance 860 v7 is slightly expensive
Few users mentioned that the shoe was heavy

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant trainers
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky to gain a ballot place in the London Marathon this year. I bought these trainers in October 2017. Utterly brilliant, no problems, so comfortable and without doubt the best trainers I have ever had. Through a long wet winter, these trainers supported my feet and made the whole preparation and marathon experience so memorable.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

product_meta.title: New Balance Mens M860BY7 M860by7
product_meta.description:
The New Balance 860 v7 is a high-mileage road running shoe with a medial post to prevent over-pronation. An excellent blend of cushioning and support. This is the 4E Width fitting of this shoe, which is the mens extra wide width fitting.




10 mm drop between heel and forefoot 
Air mesh 
Asymmetrical heel counter 
Blown rubber outsole 
Dual density midsole
No-sew details
Ortholite Premium insole provides additional cushioning for arch support and durable comfort. 
Synthetic/mesh upper
